name: WORMFOOD
description:
BECOME THE WORM FOOD

Science Commander Space Bunny has entered an alien stomach! 

Help them defeat the defense organisms and collect their DNA! 

Spores, phages, and deadly worms block your way. 

How deep will you get?

Worm Food is a twin-stick shooter with nostalgic Game Boy styling and lots of explosions. Rotate your ship strategically to block with your shield and protect your precious core!

Created for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019 theme - DNA Chaos!

.  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .

Controls

Mouse = Aim  

Left mouse click = Set firing target  

WASD or Arrow Keys = Move
